income_messages:
From: t*************e@proton.me
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 07:14:29
SUBJECT: Dear Winner,
Dear Winner,
We are pleased to inform you that you have won the grand prize in THE LOTTER International Online Multi-Draw. After a careful and thorough selection process, your number has been chosen as the winning combination, making you the sole winner of the [AMOUNT CAN NOT BE DISCLOSED ONLINE FOR SECURITY PURPOSE] prize.
Congratulations on this incredible win! We understand that this news may come as a surprise to you, so we recommend that you take a moment to let it sink in. Please be assured that our team is here to guide you through the next steps, answer any questions you may have, and help you claim your prize.
To begin the prize claim process, please contact us at your earliest convenience by sending an email to [thelottercentre@proton.me]. We will provide you with all the necessary information and instructions on how to claim your prize.
Once again, congratulations on your big win! We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The Lotter Online Lottery Team
From: t*************e@proton.me
To: rv40472@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 19:55:41
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Winner,
Congratulations on winning the lottery Prize of ($9,352,000.00). Here are the general steps to claim your prize:
Provide us with these documents and information: A valid photo ID, Resident Address, Phone/Mobile numbers and your private email.
Here are some common options for lottery payouts:
1. Lump sum payment: This option allows the winner to take the entire prize amount in one payment. This is typically the preferred option for winners who want to receive their winnings immediately and have control over the entire amount.
2. Annuity payment: With this option, the winner receives the prize amount in installments over a period of years.
3. Combination payment: Some lotteries offer a combination of a lump sum payment and an annuity payment. This allows the winner to receive a portion of their winnings immediately while also receiving regular payments over a period of years.
4. Estate planning option: This option allows the winner to designate a beneficiary to receive the remaining annuity payments in the event of the winner's death.
Regards,
The Lotter Online Lottery Team
Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.
outbound_messages:
From: rv40472@l******s.email
To: t*************e@proton.me
Time: 2023-04-09 07:14:33
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Winner,
Dear Lotter Online Lottery Team,
Thank you for informing me that I have won the grand prize. I am excited and grateful for this opportunity. However, before I proceed with any further steps, I would like to request more information about the prize and the claim process. Can you please provide me with more details about the prize amount and the steps I need to take to claim it? 
Thank you for your assistance.
Best wishes,
Herbert
From: rv40472@l******s.email
To: t*************e@proton.me
Time: 2023-04-10 23:49:22
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Winner,
Dear Winner,
Congratulations on winning the lottery prize! Here are the general steps to claim your prize:
1. Verify your winning ticket: Make sure you have the winning ticket and that it is verified by the lottery officials.
2. Choose your payment option: You have the option of choosing between a lump sum payment or an annuity payment. Some lotteries offer both options. You can also choose the estate planning option.
3. Claim your prize: Follow the instructions provided by the lottery officials to claim your prize. This may involve filling out forms and providing identification.
4. Receive your winnings: Once your claim is verified, you will receive your winnings according to the payment option you chose.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us. We are here to help you through the process.
Best wishes,
Herbert
